text: The building's exterior in 2012 The Ford Motor Company Assembly Plant is a building located at 4735 E. Marginal Way South in Seattle, Washington. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places on October 9, 2013. It is now part of the Federal Center South complex and is owned by the General Services Administration. ==See also== * National Register of Historic Places listings in Seattle, Washington ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Seattle Category:Government buildings in Seattle
title: Ford Motor Company Assembly Plant (Seattle)
